document_data.mainbody: The '''Glaezel''' family was a prominent business-owning family of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century DR, the Glaezel family was a prominent and a long-standing family that owned many businesses and buildings across Baldur's Gate. [[Manthuran Glaezel]] became the family's head some years before the late 14{{th}} century DR. The family's properties included [[Glaezel's Dock]] in the [[Seatower]] district of the [[Lower City]].
